title: 我的世界闪退
author: 我爱恶魂
txt_content:
我用的是官方启动器。游戏版本是1.7.10Forge 10.13.2.129。什么mod都没装。下面是错误报告---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Shall we play a game?

Time: 15-6-1 下午8:48
Description: Starting integrated server

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError

        Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.8.0_25, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 140541856 bytes (134 MB) / 236535808 bytes (225 MB) up to 523501568 bytes (499 MB)
        JVM Flags: 6 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Xmx512M -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -Xmn128M
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used

        FML{7.10.85.1291} [Forge Mod Loader] (forge-1.7.10-10.13.2.1291.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        Forge{10.13.2.1291} [Minecraft Forge] (forge-1.7.10-10.13.2.1291.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        Launched Version: 1.7.10-Forge10.13.2.1291
        LWJGL: 2.9.1
        OpenGL: AMD Radeon HD 8210 GL version 4.2.12422 Compatibility Profile Context 13.152.0.0, ATI Technologies Inc.
        GL Caps: Using GL 1.3 multitexturing.
Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported.
Anisotropic filtering is supported and maximum anisotropy is 16.
Shaders are available because OpenGL 2.1 is supported.

        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge'
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Resource Packs: []
        Current Language: 简体中文 (中国)
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        Anisotropic Filtering: Off (1)   开存档就退。win7,32位的.处理器AMD E1-2100，内存2.00GB,还剩1.70GB.拜托各位大神了！
行行好吧这是我全部的金粒了··· ···
顺便问一下正版用户怎么换皮肤

TNT苦力怕 发表于 2015-6-2 21:02
你的MC是什么版本
1.7.10的，用了Forge,没安mod

replies.author: RecursiveG
replies.txt_content:
正版皮肤这边换 --> https://minecraft.net/profile
有一组单选按钮，可以选皮肤模型 Steve/Alex
然后有一个"选择文件"的按钮上传文件
最后点"Upload"按钮确认

如果不想要皮肤了下面还有"Reset"按钮重置皮肤
